mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, emp_no, com_id, dept_no, board_title, board_content, board_update_date, board_read_count) values(board_seq.nextval, #{empNo}, #{comId}, #{deptNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUpdateDate}, #{boardReadCount})
mapper.select: SELECT board.*, emp.emp_name, dept.dept_name FROM board JOIN emp ON board.emp_no = emp.emp_no JOIN dept ON emp.dept_no = dept.dept_no WHERE board.com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY board.board_no DESC
